description.author: Salesforce
text: This component represents a customizable icon component, where the icon rendered can be dynamically determined by the `symbol` property. It allows setting the icon variant and size, and it appends the SVG node to the icon element in the DOM upon rendering.

elements.name: iconElement
elements.description: Represents the icon element where the SVG content is appended

text: Check if the icon element is visible
Check if the icon element is present in the DOM
